data.name: The Hidden Room - Pyramid
data.detailed_description:
Learn more about the DLC

Learn more about the DLC here!
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1771380/view/3146322746577172474


About the Game

Continue your adventure in the game with The Hidden Room - Pyramid! After what happened in Tom Barkley's house, you think that it's not over yet. That something else might have been hidden. This is your chance to find it out...again
data.about_the_game: Continue your adventure in the game with The Hidden Room - Pyramid! After what happened in Tom Barkley's house, you think that it's not over yet. That something else might have been hidden. This is your chance to find it out...again
data.short_description: Continue your adventure in the game with The Hidden Room - Pyramid! After what happened in Tom Barkley's house, you decide to keep on searching.
